.. _class_CPUParticles3D_property_color:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **color** = ``Color(1, 1, 1, 1)`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_color**\ (\ value\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`\ )
- :ref:`Color<class_Color>` **get_color**\ (\ )

æ¯ä¸ªç²’å­çš„åˆå§‹é¢œè‰²ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`color<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color>` ä¹˜ä»¥ç²’å­ç½‘æ ¼çš„é¡¶ç‚¹é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¦åœ¨ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D<class_BaseMaterial3D>` ä¸Šäº§ç”Ÿå¯è§æ•ˆæœï¼Œ\ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo<class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo>` *å¿…é¡»*\ ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`ShaderMaterial<class_ShaderMaterial>`\ ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨ç€è‰²å™¨çš„ ``fragment()`` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ’å…¥ ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œ\ :ref:`color<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color>` å°†æ²¡æœ‰å¯è§æ•ˆæœã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>` **color_initial_ramp** :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ value\: :ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>`\ )
- :ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>` **get_color_initial_ramp**\ (\ )

æ¯ä¸ªç²’å­çš„åˆå§‹é¢œè‰²å°†æ²¿ç€è¯¥ :ref:`GradientTexture1D<class_GradientTexture1D>`\ ï¼ˆä¹˜ä»¥ :ref:`color<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color>`\ ï¼‰è€Œå˜åŒ–ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`color_initial_ramp<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp>` ä¹˜ä»¥ç²’å­ç½‘æ ¼çš„é¡¶ç‚¹é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¦åœ¨ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D<class_BaseMaterial3D>` ä¸Šäº§ç”Ÿå¯è§æ•ˆæœï¼Œ\ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo<class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo>` *å¿…é¡»*\ ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`ShaderMaterial<class_ShaderMaterial>`\ ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨ç€è‰²å™¨çš„ ``fragment()`` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ’å…¥ ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œ\ :ref:`color_initial_ramp<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_initial_ramp>` å°†æ²¡æœ‰å¯è§æ•ˆæœã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>` **color_ramp** :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_color_ramp**\ (\ value\: :ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>`\ )
- :ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>` **get_color_ramp**\ (\ )

æ¯ä¸ªç²’å­çš„é¢œè‰²å°†åœ¨å…¶ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå†…æ²¿è¯¥ :ref:`GradientTexture1D<class_GradientTexture1D>` å˜åŒ–ï¼ˆä¹˜ä»¥ :ref:`color<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color>`\ ï¼‰ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`color_ramp<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp>` ä¹˜ä»¥ç²’å­ç½‘æ ¼çš„é¡¶ç‚¹é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¦åœ¨ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D<class_BaseMaterial3D>` ä¸Šäº§ç”Ÿå¯è§æ•ˆæœï¼Œ\ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo<class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo>` *å¿…é¡»*\ ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`ShaderMaterial<class_ShaderMaterial>`\ ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨ç€è‰²å™¨çš„ ``fragment()`` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ’å…¥ ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œ\ :ref:`color_ramp<class_CPUParticles3D_property_color_ramp>` å°†æ²¡æœ‰å¯è§æ•ˆæœã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_CPUParticles3D_property_damping_curve:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`Curve<class_Curve>` **damping_curve** :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_CPUParticles3D_property_damping_curve>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_param_curve**\ (\ param\: :ref:`Parameter<enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter>`, curve\: :ref:`Curve<class_Curve>`\ )
- :ref:`Curve<class_Curve>` **get_param_curve**\ (\ param\: :ref:`Parameter<enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter>`\ ) |const|

é˜»å°¼å°†æ²¿ç€è¿™æ¡ :ref:`Gradient<class_Gradient>` å˜åŒ–ã€‚

.. _class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>` **emission_colors** = ``PackedColorArray()`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_emission_colors**\ (\ value\: :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>`\ )
- :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>` **get_emission_colors**\ (\ )

è®¾ç½®ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS<class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_POINTS>` æˆ– :ref:`EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS<class_CPUParticles3D_constant_EMISSION_SHAPE_DIRECTED_POINTS>` æ—¶å¯¹ç²’å­è¿›è¡Œè°ƒåˆ¶çš„ :ref:`Color<class_Color>`\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`emission_colors<class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors>` ä¼šä¸ç²’å­ç½‘æ ¼çš„é¡¶ç‚¹é¢œè‰²ç›¸ä¹˜ã€‚è¦åœ¨ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D<class_BaseMaterial3D>` ä¸Šäº§ç”Ÿå¯è§æ•ˆæœï¼Œ\ :ref:`BaseMaterial3D.vertex_color_use_as_albedo<class_BaseMaterial3D_property_vertex_color_use_as_albedo>` *å¿…é¡»*\ ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`ShaderMaterial<class_ShaderMaterial>`\ ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨ç€è‰²å™¨çš„ ``fragment()`` å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ’å…¥ ``ALBEDO *= COLOR.rgb;``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ :ref:`emission_colors<class_CPUParticles3D_property_emission_colors>` ä¸ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿå¯è§æ•ˆæœã€‚

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See :ref:`PackedColorArray<class_PackedColorArray>` for more details.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

- :ref:`float<class_float>` **get_param_min**\ (\ param\: :ref:`Parameter<enum_CPUParticles3D_Parameter>`\ ) |const|

æœ€å°çº¿æ€§åŠ é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator
